page.title: 04PINDERS FARM
page.content: PINDERS FARM WAS BUILT IN 1660 AND IS THE OLDEST IN THE VILLAGE.WE RENT IT FROM BAGOTS AT LEVENS HALL AS IT IS PART OF THEIR ESTATE.IT IS A VERY HARD FARM TO WORK AS IT IS NOT IN A RING FENCE.WE ALSO HAVE SOME LAND AS FAR AWAY AS SEVEN MILES.THE FARM IS A MIXED ONE WITH SHEEP,MILK AND BEEF COWS,ONE HORSE,TWO LIMOSIN BULLS AND SOME CHICKENS.THE FARM IS WORKED BY TRADITIONAL METHODS WITH A VIEW TO CONSERVING THE NATURAL BEAUTY OF THE COUNTRY BY KEEPING THE HEDGES AND DRY STONE WALLS IN GOOD ORDER.
